name: Wander No More
description: Wander No More is a Kinetic Novel (a visual novel without any choices) which centers around the life of Kouichirou Nabatame, a renowned samurai, and Chiyo, a young village girl. Wander No More tells the story of how these two met, became a family, and attempted to restore their lives to what they once were.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card (capable of 1080p output) Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5Ghz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card (capable of 1080p output) Storage: 5 GB available space
